MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA1 postcode area of Kilmarnock, affecting properties in Doon place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.04pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 08.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:43am on Tuesday, 02 March 2021
